channel.title: MAT 219 - Data Science I on MAT 219 Data Science
channel.description: Recent content in MAT 219 - Data Science I on MAT 219 Data Science

item.description: Note: This page will be updated throughout the semester. Date Lesson Slides Readings R-HW DS-HW Project Week 00 Mon, Jan 18 No class - Martin Luther King, Jr. Day holiday Wed, Jan 20 Introduction to Data Science Week 01 Mon, Jan 24 Meet The Tools and Visualization Intro Wed, Jan 26 Visualization Part 1 Week 02 Mon, Jan 31 Visualization Part 2 and Functions Wed, Feb 2 Functions and Data Manipulation Week 03 Mon, Feb 07 Data Manipulation With dplyr and tidyr Wed, Feb 09 Data Manipulation With tidyr Week 04 Mon, Feb 14 Potpourri Of Topics (readr, Relational Data, R Markdown) Wed, Feb 16 Relational Data and String Manipulation Week 05 Mon, Feb 21 String Manipulation and Regex's Wed, Feb 23 Web Scraping and API's Week 06 Mon, Feb 28 Thinking Deeper about Data Visualizations Wed, Mar 2 Web Scraping and Data Cleaning Activity March 23rd and March 25th Week 07 March 30th and April 1st Week 08 April 2nd Week 08.
